about_the_game: Take a look inside the Design Booklet to find art, level sketches, marketing materials, info on the design process and more. This booklet is a complimentary treat for all the players who gave The Adventures of Elena Temple a try. Thank you for your support!
detailed_description: Take a look inside the Design Booklet to find art, level sketches, marketing materials, info on the design process and more. This booklet is a complimentary treat for all the players who gave The Adventures of Elena Temple a try. Thank you for your support!

fullgame.name: The Adventures of Elena Temple: Definitive Edition

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mb VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Acrobat Reader or other tool that reads PDF files

name: The Adventures of Elena Temple - Design Booklet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mb VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Acrobat Reader or other tool that reads PDF files

short_description: A Design Booklet that looks behind the curtain at the process of creating The Adventures of Elena Temple.
